About Me

Hello there! I am a current graduate student of Arizona State University's master in computer science program at Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering. I was previously employed in Electronics for imaging as Associate Software Engineer.
I am highly passionate about solving real-world problems, developing efficient and scalable solutions and have extensive experience as a software engineer. I exhibit an entrepreneurial mentality and am eager to learn and adapt to different environments. My main areas of interest are Machine learning and Data Analysis.

Currently, I am seeking software engineering internship opportunities for summer 2020. Feel free to connect with me and say hello!
